name: GPTZero
description: GPTZero is an AI detection tool designed to identify text generated by large language models and ensure content authenticity.
longDescription: GPTZero is an AI detection platform developed to distinguish human-written text from content generated by AI models like ChatGPT, GPT-4, and Claude. Founded by Edward Tian in January 2023, it aims to promote responsible AI use in education, publishing, and content creation. The platform uses advanced algorithms to analyze text based on metrics like perplexity and burstiness, helping users verify authenticity. It serves educators, students, writers, and businesses by offering tools to detect AI-generated content and prevent plagiarism. With over 8 million users, GPTZero has become a leading solution for maintaining digital trust and content integrity. The platform also supports integrations with educational systems and provides detailed analytics for institutional use.
features: AI Detection: Accurately identifies text generated by AI models like ChatGPT, GPT-4, and Claude to ensure content authenticity.
Sentence-Level Highlighting: Highlights specific sentences flagged as AI-generated, providing granular insights for users.
Plagiarism Checking: Detects potential plagiarism in documents to support academic and professional integrity.
Authorship Verification: Verifies whether content was written by a human, aiding in content validation for various industries.
API Integration: Offers seamless integration with platforms like Canvas and Blackboard for institutional use.
Deep Scan Analysis: Provides nuanced distinctions between human and AI text, enhancing detection accuracy.
Copyright Check: Identifies if AI-generated text matches online sources, protecting against copyright issues.
SEO Optimization Support: Helps content creators ensure originality to avoid penalties from search engines.

faqs.question: What is GPTZero used for?
faqs.answer: GPTZero detects AI-generated text to ensure content authenticity for educators, students, writers, and businesses.

faqs.question: Does GPTZero offer a free plan?
faqs.answer: Yes, GPTZero provides free access to its core AI detection features with limitations, alongside premium plans.

faqs.question: Can GPTZero detect non-English text?
faqs.answer: It primarily supports English text, with limited accuracy for non-English content; more languages are planned.

faqs.question: Is GPTZero suitable for academic use?
faqs.answer: Yes, it helps educators detect AI-generated content in assignments, though users should verify results to avoid false accusations.

faqs.question: How can I integrate GPTZero with my platform?
faqs.answer: GPTZero offers API and integrations with systems like Canvas; contact api@gptzero.me for support.

faqs.question: Does GPTZero offer discounts for schools?
faqs.answer: Educational institutions may receive special pricing; check the website or contact support for details.

faqs.question: Can GPTZero detect all AI models?
faqs.answer: It detects major models like ChatGPT and GPT-4 but may vary in accuracy with newer or less common models.
